familyInfo.title: Family & Financial Information
familyInfo.description: Please provide information about your family and financial situation

situationInfo.title: Situation Descriptions
situationInfo.financialSituationPlaceholder: Describe your current financial challenges and circumstances...
situationInfo.employmentCircumstancesPlaceholder: Describe your employment situation and any challenges you're facing...
situationInfo.reasonForApplyingPlaceholder: Explain why you need financial assistance and how it will help you...

ai.error: Failed to generate suggestion. Please try again.
ai.timeout: Request timed out. Please try again.
ai.editBeforeAccepting: You can edit the text before accepting it.

validation.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
validation.phoneInvalid: Please enter a valid phone number
validation.nationalIdInvalid: Please enter a valid national ID
validation.incomeInvalid: Please enter a valid income amount
validation.dependentsInvalid: Please enter a valid number of dependents

success.title: Application Submitted Successfully
success.message: Your application has been submitted and is being reviewed. You will be contacted within 5-7 business days.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using this Social Support Portal, you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use this service.

eligibility.title: Eligibility Requirements
eligibility.content: To apply for social support benefits, you must meet the following requirements:

requirements.age: Be at least 18 years of age or an emancipated minor
requirements.citizenship: Be a citizen or legal permanent resident
requirements.income: Meet income and asset requirements as defined by current guidelines
requirements.documentation: Provide accurate and complete documentation as requested

application.title: Application Process
application.content: All applications are subject to review and verification. Processing times may vary based on application volume and complexity.

warning.title: Important Notice
warning.content: Providing false or misleading information may result in denial of benefits and potential legal consequences.

privacy.title: Privacy and Data Protection
privacy.content: We are committed to protecting your personal information. The following data is collected during the application process:

dataCollection.title: Data We Collect:
dataCollection.circumstances: Information about your current circumstances and needs

aiAssistance.title: AI Writing Assistance
aiAssistance.content: This portal includes AI-powered writing assistance to help you complete your application. This feature is optional and provided for your convenience.

disclaimer.title: AI Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: AI-generated suggestions are provided as guidance only. You are responsible for reviewing and ensuring the accuracy of all information in your application.

obligations.title: Your Obligations
obligations.content: By using this service, you agree to:
obligations.updates: Notify us of any changes to your circumstances
obligations.misuse: Not misuse or abuse this service or system

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.content: If you have questions about these terms or need assistance with your application, please contact us:

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Get in touch with our support team for assistance with your application or general inquiries.

phone.title: Phone Support
phone.description: Call us during business hours for immediate assistance

email.title: Email Support
email.description: Send us an email and we'll respond within 24 hours

address.title: Visit Our Office
address.description: Visit us in person during business hours

emergency.title: Emergency Assistance
emergency.content: If you are experiencing a crisis or emergency situation, please contact our emergency hotline immediately:

form.title: Send us a Message
form.name: Full Name
form.subject: Subject
form.messagePlaceholder: Please describe your question or concern in detail...

success.title: Message Sent Successfully
success.message: Thank you for contacting us. We will respond to your message within 24 hours.

restoreProgress.title: Restore Progress
restoreProgress.description: We found saved progress from your previous session.
